# TimedText:Jeff Wayne The War of the Worlds.ogg.en-gb.srt

0
00:00:00.530 --> 00:00:04.000
He was convinced there could be no living thing on that remote,
1
00:00:04.000 --> 00:00:07.200
forbidding planet.
2
00:00:07.819 --> 00:00:11.700
"The chances of anything coming from Mars...
3
00:00:11.700 --> 00:00:13.856
...are a million to one," he said.
4
00:00:17.400 --> 00:00:19.856
"The chances of anything...
